mapper.insert: INSERT INTO payments ( payment_id, payment_intent_id, buyer_id, order_id, total_amount_value, captured_amount_value, refunded_amount_value, currency, status, payment_lines, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{paymentId}, #{paymentIntentId}, #{buyerId}, #{orderId}, #{totalAmountValue}, #{capturedAmountValue}, #{refundedAmountValue}, #{currency}, #{status}, CAST(#{paymentLinesJson} AS jsonb), #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
mapper.select: SELECT payment_id, payment_intent_id, buyer_id, order_id, total_amount_value, currency, captured_amount_value, refunded_amount_value, status, created_at, updated_at, payment_lines::text as payment_lines FROM payments WHERE payment_id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE payments SET payment_intent_id = #{paymentIntentId}, order_id = #{orderId}, buyer_id = #{buyerId}, total_amount_value = #{totalAmountValue}, captured_amount_value = #{capturedAmountValue}, refunded_amount_value = #{refundedAmountValue}, currency = #{currency}, status = #{status}, payment_lines = CAST(#{paymentLinesJson} AS jsonb), created_at = #{createdAt}, updated_at = #{updatedAt} WHERE payment_id = #{paymentId}
